\newcommand{\exTitle}[1]{
\begin{center}
\begin{huge}
\textbf{#1}
\end{huge}
\end{center}
}

\newcommand{\exSubtitle}[1]{
\noindent
\begin{large}
\textbf{#1}
\end{large}
}

\newcommand{\exPlot}[1]{
\begin{center}
	\includegraphics[max width = \textwidth]{./img/#1.eps} 
\end{center}
}

\newcommand{\exTable}[1]{
\begin{center}
	\begin{adjustbox}{max width=\textwidth}
	#1
	\end{adjustbox}
\end{center}
}

\newenvironment{exFooter}{\par\vspace*{\fill}}{\clearpage}
